Why Zimbra?

Zimbra e-mail solution is one of the leading webmail servers. With easy integration and independent of the platform, it is linked with every finest operating system including Windows, Linux, and Mac. An enterprise-class email, calendar and collaboration solution built for both the public and private cloud. Zimbra offers the most innovative messaging experience available today, connecting end users to the information and activity in their personal clouds.

Advantages of Zimbra



  • Low cost compared to other email collaboration services

  • High security with robust spam and virus protection
  • Provides Mobile access for every platform
  • Data synchronization is possible
  • Provides Email backup and Restore
